Is a versatile liquid obtained from the [[oil refinery|Oil Refinery]] after processing [[crude oil|Crude Oil]]. It is further separated into [[diesel|Diesel]] and [[kerosene|Kerosene]] using a [[fractioning tower|Fractioning Tower]] or [[reformed|Reforming]] into [[aromatic hydrocarbons|Aromatic Hydrocarbons]] and [[reformate gas|Reformate Gas]].

It is used to produce [[desh|Desh]] in the [[chemical plant|Chemical Plant]] and the [[rotary furnace|Rotary Furnace]].

In the [[fusion reactor breeding chamber|Fusion Reactor Breeding Chamber]], light oil is used to obtain reformate gas.
